titleStmt.title: A discoursive coniecture vpon the reasons that produce a desired event of the present troubles of Great Britaine, different from those of Lower Germanie Considered in the maine passages that seeme parallel, but upon a further survey are discovered to be otherwise. By Calybute Downing, L.L.D. pastor of Hackney.
titleStmt.author: Downing, Calybute, 1606-1644.

publicationStmt.publisher: printed by Richard Hearne for Iohn Partridge, and are to be sould at Purse Court, in the Old Change,

notesStmt.note: A reissue, with cancel title page, of the edition with "printed by Richard Hearne, and are to be sold by Iohn Partridge. 1641" in imprint.
Reproduction of original in the Henry E. Huntington Library.

place.placeName: Purse Court, in the Old Change
